New_Brunswick.Beaverdam Brook (New Jersey):
Beaverdam Brook is a tributary of Lawrence Brook in central East Brunswick, New Jersey in the United States.


== Course ==
The source of Beaverdam Brook is at 40°25′33″N 74°25′44″W in central East Brunswick, near the intersection of CR-617 (Ryders Lane) with Dunhams Corner Road. It crosses Dutch Road and the New Jersey Turnpike.
